title: LFP Support needed, any rank.
body:
Looking for a duo partner, must have curse voice(pref) or Skype.

I am currently silver 4, wanting to main adc this season. I used to be gold and am hoping to reach gold again, add me in game if your keen.

Pat The Bunny

replies.body:
Hey there,

I am currently Bronze 2. I main support. Season 4 Thresh was my most used champ (55% win ratio) with Karma support the 2nd most (57% win ratio). However I have used a lot of support champs including Morgana, Soraka, Leona. I own over 100 champs so am willing to learn other supports if you prefer and/or new ones that emerge in the Season 5 meta.

I have Curse Voice installed. 

In game name is Sugar13. I will add you.

Awesome man, I don't like to think I'm that good, so I'm keen to learn more and adapt so we can play well together, I've accepted your friend request.

Hope to see you online :)
